org.horrabin.horrorss
Class RssParser

java.lang.Object
  org.horrabin.horrorss.RssParser
public class RssParser
extends java.lang.Object

RSS file parser compatible with all RSS, RDF & Atom specifications.

Author:
Fernando Fornieles

setCharset

public void setCharset(java.lang.String charset)
Tells the parser what charset must use. Default UTF-8.

Parameters:
charset - String the charset (iso-8859-1, utf-8,...).

enableCache

public void enableCache(java.lang.String cacheDir,
                        long cacheLifeTime)
Enables the caching system.

Parameters:
cacheDir - String the directory the cache will use to store the contents.
cacheLifeTime - long Cache lifetime in milliseconds. If cacheLifeTime=0 it will be disabled.
